text: sarvA$ByOq vai dEqvatA$ByOq&gniScI#yatEq yath saqyujOq nOpa#daqddhyAd dEqvatA# asyAqgniM ~MvRu#~jjIraqnq. yath saqyuja# upaqdadhA$tyAqtmanaiqvaina(gm)# saqyuja#M cinutEq nAgninAq vyRu#ddhyaqtE&thOq yathAq puru#ShaqH snAva#BiqH saMta#ta EqvamEqvaitABi#raqgniH saMta#tOq &gninAq vai dEqvAH su#vaqrgaM ~MlOqkamA#yaqn tA aqmUH kRutti#kA aBavaqnq yasyaiqtA u#pa dhIqyantE# suvaqrgamEqva - [  ] 38
